author: Staff Reporter
text:
The mandatory wearing of helmets by even pillion riders of two-wheelers will be enforced in the city from January 11, the state transport Department has stated in an official notification issued here recently.

While Transport Commissioner Ramegowda said all pillions, with no exceptions, will have to wear helmets on motorcycles; Transport Minister Ramalinga Reddy said a three-month relaxation period will be given until the rule catches on with the motorists of the city.

The Government order comes in the wake of a Supreme Court directive to all the States on improving safety on roads.
title: Helmets must for pillion riders from Jan. 11
